name: PebbleHost Server Control Bot
message: Don't forget to rename the config.example.yml file to config.yml then change all of the options as explained in the file!

name: Jagrosh's MusicBot
message: Be sure to edit your config.txt to set the bot owner and token!

name: Frost Cleverbot
message: Be sure to edit the frost.py file to set the discord bot token and PandoraBots ID

name: Bastion Bot
message: Be sure to edit settings/credentials.yaml to set your bot ID and token. Addtionally, you need a MongoDB database, open a ticket to get this created!

name: Master Bot
message: Be sure to edit config.json to set your token, and index.js to set your bot ID.

name: Captcha Bot
message: Be sure to edit config/config.json to set your token and other settings required for Captcha Bot

name: Minesweeper Bot
message: Be sure to edit auth.json to set your token and other settings required for Minesweeper Bot

name: Evo Bot
message: Be sure to edit config.json to set your token and other settings required for Evo Bot

name: Loritta Bot
message: Be sure to edit discord.conf and loritta.conf to set your token and other required settings.
